title: ***SULLIVAN SQUARE-AUGUST MOVE-IN-NO FEE BRAND NEW 4BED/2BATH PETS OK
posting_body: ['AVAILABLE NOW!', 'AUGUST/SEPTEMBER MOVE-IN', 'FULL FEE PAID BY OWNER', 'Sullivan Square', 'Closest train =', 'Sullivan Square', '- 4 bed/2 bath (third floor/left side)', '- Brand New Everything 2022 (all high-end finishes)', '- Massive living room open to kitchen', '- Skylight above beautiful winding staircase', '- Gorgeous white-granite counters', '- New cabinets', '- New stainless-steel appliances', '- Hardwood floors', '- Modern/tiled bathrooms', '- Central heat and AC (with NEST thermostat)', '- In-unit laundry', '- Private deck', '- Door buzzer & intercom system', '- Bike room available for tenants use', '- Private deck', 'Please email Ben with any questions or to schedule a viewing of the property!', 'BenC @ <URL>', 'Ben Carroll of Benjamin Apartments & Cityside Homes', 'Real Estate Professional', '860 - 485 -5721', "Search Boston's largest selection of apartments at <URL>", 'Transportation', 'Bus: 91 25 Webster Ave @ Newton St (0.51 mi)', 'Bus: 87 Somerville Ave @ Merriam St (0.38 mi)', 'Bus: 85 Summer St @ Wesley Park (0.45 mi)', 'Bus: CT2 30 Prospect St (0.44 mi)', 'Bus: 86 Washington St @ Tufts St (0.20 mi)', 'Bus: 88 422 McGrath Hwy (0.11 mi)', 'Bus: 90 Cross St @ Auburn Ave (0.02 mi)', 'Bus: 80 Cross St @ Fountain Ave (0.02 mi)', 'Bus: 101 Broadway @', 'Cross St (0.39 mi)', 'Bus: 95 Mystic Ave @ Plaza Entrance - Home Depot (0.61 mi)']
